p: Piralla, Antonio, Marco Zecca, Patrizia Comoli, Alessia Girello, Rita Maccario, and Fausto Baldanti. 2015. “Persistent Rhinovirus Infection in Pediatric Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant Recipients with Impaired Cellular Immunity.” Journal of Clinical Virology 67: 38–42. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jcv.2015.03.022.
